#summary How to add new KiCAD libraries to your projects

This example will use the Opendous KiCAD libraries available through [http://code.google.com/p/opendous/source/browse/trunk/Current_Designs/KiCAD_Libraries SVN] or in the [http://code.google.com/p/opendous/downloads/list downloads] section.

== Adding Schematic Symbol Libraries ==

After starting or [http://code.google.com/p/opendous/wiki/KiCADTutorialOpeningProjects opening] a project, run *EEschema*.  Select _Library_ from the _Preferences_ menu:

http://opendous.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Pictures/KiCAD_Tutorial-AddLibraries-01.jpg

Click the _Ins_ button to insert a new library:

http://opendous.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Pictures/KiCAD_Tutorial-AddLibraries-02.jpg

Find `opendous.lib` in `/library/` where you extracted [http://code.google.com/p/opendous/downloads/list Opendous_KiCAD_Libraries-?.zip]:

http://opendous.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Pictures/KiCAD_Tutorial-AddLibraries-03.jpg

The library contents will now be available to your project:

http://opendous.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Pictures/KiCAD_Tutorial-AddLibraries-04.jpg

Click _Save Cfg_ to save the configuration file for the current project:

http://opendous.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Pictures/KiCAD_Tutorial-AddLibraries-05.jpg

== Adding Layout Footprint Libraries ==

After starting or [http://code.google.com/p/opendous/wiki/KiCADTutorialOpeningProjects opening] a project, run *PCBnew*.  Select _Library_ from the _Preferences_ menu:

http://opendous.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Pictures/KiCAD_Tutorial-AddLibraries-06.jpg

Click the _Ins_ button to insert a new library:

http://opendous.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Pictures/KiCAD_Tutorial-AddLibraries-07.jpg

Find `opendous.mod` in `/modules/` where you extracted [http://code.google.com/p/opendous/downloads/list Opendous_KiCAD_Libraries-?.zip]:

http://opendous.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Pictures/KiCAD_Tutorial-AddLibraries-08.jpg

The library contents will now be available to your project:

http://opendous.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Pictures/KiCAD_Tutorial-AddLibraries-09.jpg

Click _Save Cfg_ to save the configuration file for the current project:

http://opendous.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Pictures/KiCAD_Tutorial-AddLibraries-05.jpg
